alert.note: Alert for Granville; Vance (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:16PM EDT until July 02 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Vance County in central North Carolina... Northern Granville County in central North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 316 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Buffalo Springs to near Virgilina to near Roxboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Stovall, Dabney, Tungsten, Satterwhite Point Marina, Steele Creek Marina & Campground, Bullocksville, Kerr Lake and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
